<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description/>
        <name>Upgrade Script-May2022 (sdc Dictionary)</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var docArr = [{
        'query': 'element=purchase_request^name=sn_spend_sdc_service_request',
        'attribute': {
            'label': 'Related PR',
            'plural': 'Related PRs'
        }
    },
    {
        'query': 'element=purchase_order^name=sn_spend_sdc_service_request',
        'attribute': {
            'label': 'Related PO',
            'plural': 'Related POs'
        }
    },
	{
        'query': 'element=service_request^name=sn_spend_sdc_service_task',
        'attribute': {
            'label': 'Related case',
            'plural': 'Related cases'
        }
    },
    {
        'query': 'element=purchase_modification_reason^name=sn_spend_sdc_service_request',
        'attribute': {
            'label': 'Reason'
        }
    },
	{
        'query': 'element=request_type^name=sn_spend_sdc_service_request',
        'attribute': {
            'label': 'Case type(deprecated)'
        }
    }
];

// Update Documentation Elements
docArr.forEach(updateDocumentation);

function updateDocumentation(docObj) {
    var documenationGr = new GlideRecord('sys_documentation');
    documenationGr.addEncodedQuery(docObj.query);
    documenationGr.query();
    while (documenationGr.next())
        new global.PTGlobalAPI().updateDictionary(documenationGr, docObj.attribute);
}
]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
